mapper.select: SELECT L.LECTURE_ID AS lectureId, L.LECTURE_COURSE_NAME AS courseName, L.LECTURE_PROFESSOR AS professor, L.LECTURE_CREDIT AS credit, L.LECTURE_MAX_CAPACITY AS maxCapacity, L.LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT AS currentCount, L.LECTURE_DIVISION AS division, L.LECTURE_ROOM AS room FROM Cart C JOIN Lecture L ON C.CART_LECTURE_ID = L.LECTURE_ID WHERE C.CART_STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} ORDER BY L.LECTURE_COURSE_NAME ASC
